    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_c3578cf5fc5618a3337138f8d2b8f9c23b3a8744</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Uses of gamma rays</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gebräuche von gamma Strahlen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Utilisations des rayons gamma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usos de raios gamma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usi dei raggi gamma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρήσεις των ακτίνων γάμμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aplicaciones de rayos gammas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of three illustrations showing the use of gamma rays. Gamma rays can be used to sterilise a surgeon's instruments.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gamma rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sterilisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wrapping</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von drei Abbildungen, die den Gebrauch von
gamma Strahlen zeigen. Gamma Strahlen können benutzt werden, um
die Instrumente eines Chirurgen zu entkeimen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de trois illustrations montrant 
l'utilisation des rayons gamma. Des rayons gamma peuvent être 
employés pour stériliser les instruments d'un chirurgien.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de três ilustrações que mostram 
o uso de raios gamma. Os raios gamma podem ser usados sterilise 
instrumentos de um cirurgião.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di tre illustrazioni che mostrano 
l'uso dei raggi gamma. I raggi gamma possono essere usati per 
sterilizzare gli strumenti del chirurgo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν τη χρήση των 
ακτίνων γάμμα. Οι ακτίνες γάμμα μπορούν να χρησιμοποιηθούν
για να αποστειρώσουν τα όργανα ενός χειρούργου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de tres ilustraciones que muestran el uso
de rayos gammas. Los rayos gammas se pueden utilizar para 
esterilizar los instrumentos de un cirujano.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gamma Strahlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sterilisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verpackung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rayons gamma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">stérilisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">emballage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">raios gamma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">esterilização</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">envolver</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">raggi gamma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sterilizzazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">spostamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ακτίνες γάμμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αποστείρωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τύλιγμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rayos gammas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">esterilización</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el envolverse</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
